Articles.Content:
So Multiplayer is already a done deal and it'll require a persistent server. Having a mobile app to connect to that for tracking would be a lot of fun for checking in and showing off.

Pushing it a bit father, the other functionality of the map overview screen (i.e. time warping, setting up maneuvers, etc) could be good too, but perhaps too finicky on a small screen and not worth the effort.

However, I could see the utility of setting waypoints that send alerts to the phone.
I think you are a little TO addicted if you actually want this
